# Changelog

All notable changes to the Aegis Research SDK will be documented in this file.

## [0.1.1] - 2026-01-07

### Changed
- Updated base URL to new domain `aegisagent.ai`
- Updated pricing table to reflect current tiers (500 free credits)
- Updated documentation URLs

### Added
- 5 real-world example scripts:
  - `competitor_analysis.py` - Multi-dimensional competitor analysis
  - `content_research.py` - Research briefs for content creation
  - `due_diligence.py` - Startup/company due diligence
  - `tech_decision.py` - Technology comparison and decisions
  - `async_batch.py` - Parallel batch research

## [0.1.0] - 2026-01-07

### Added
- Initial release
- `AegisResearch` client class
- Research execution with shallow/medium/deep depth
- Credit balance checking
- Research history retrieval
- Typed response models
- Comprehensive error handling
